comments.author: MuffinMaster

I don't know what the purpose of this game of yours is at all. To show how you have a screenshot where some "big numbers" are written?The only reason I can think of is that he wanted to start creating a positive credit history for the @goku88 account. Probably after 2-3 "repaid" fake loans, there would be an attempt to take a real loan from someone without collateral, because "saiyan people have word of a stone."   , but of course he would simply disappear with the borrowed money.He got a lesson and learned not to make stupid mistakes. He will for sure try again, so this is example why everyone should be wary of loans without collateral.

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Quote from: mv1986 on February 07, 2023, 02:45:58 AMI guess the tag is not for the action itself, but for his disrespectful thought process that someone could be so stupid to believe what's happening!  Hilarious! It's a good tag to make it clear what it's all about. There are a lot of naive people out there, even on this forum, and the scammers rely on preying on a minority of the clueless or naive. The weapons we have are the red tags and it is convenient to use them in cases like this.
